name_input.title: Dear Farmer, please enter your first or last name

user_guide_screen.instruction_title: Instructions for taking rice leaf image
user_guide_screen.instruction_1: Place a white paper under the rice leaf for better contrast.
user_guide_screen.instruction_2: Take a clear photo with the leaf fully visible.
user_guide_screen.instruction_3: Use natural light and avoid shadows or direct flash.
user_guide_screen.instruction_4: Capture the image in good lighting, preferably outdoors.
user_guide_screen.instruction_5: When taking an image, always focus on the center of the rice leaf to get accurate results.
user_guide_screen.instruction_6: After taking the image, crop it to focus only on the rice leaf.

home_screen.instruction_text:
Check 10 randomly selected rice plants per field to get
fertilizer recommendation

scan_screen.title: Scan rice leaf
scan_screen.align_instruction: Please align the leaf within the frame
scan_screen.retake_prompt: Is this image clear and not cropped any part?\nIf not, please retake the photo.
scan_screen.timeout_response: Server took too long to respond
